# Week 11 Shiny App — Palmer Penguins Explorer

This app let's you explore the Palmer Penguins dataset with interactive scatter plots.

[**Live app**](https://jordanvest.shinyapps.io/penguins_explorer_HW11/)

Files included:

- Script/penguins_app/app.R — Shiny app script
- Data/penguins.csv — dataset used
- HTML link to shiny app : https://jordanvest.shinyapps.io/penguins_explorer_HW11/
